title: Slow client issues
body: Alright, so I recently installed league after not having a PC for forever, and whenever I press the play button or try to leave the end game summary screen it always takes way too long than usual to go to the next screen and it seems like it is trying to catch-up because it loads up too many things. Anyone ever had anything similar happen to them, i'm starting to think it is a PC issue or file location problem, but it could just be league or my connection while on client because in-game my connection is fine. Help me out my dudes.

replies.body:
I don't think it's a PC issue, I'm having the exact same problems, all other games fine, in game ping fine, everything else on my computer runs fine etc. just strictly the client, happened for me after the most recent patch and I noticed but don't quote me on it since it was a few days ago that they were having bandwidth problems or something like that with people who were trying to download it? so maybe they're related, I have low spec mode enabled and have tried solutions on reddit/google/boards.

Hope a red can respond

thx

EDIT: I've also tried hextech repair tool and looked at my logs, I can load into 1 game slowly but after that I have to restart client and logs say its because the connection keeps timing out? whihc is weird since I can load into the first game fine

I fixed my problem dude, I had to run Task manager with admin privileges and set affinity to run each league process with two cores instead of all 8.

Funny how we have a support section on boards yet every thread in the section is dead, no Red replies at all, etc. Riot going downhill hard
Ye I do hope that they start paying more attention to these threads...

Heya, 

Apologies for the massive delay in replying. Are you still experiencing this issue? If yes, could you run through [this article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002840248-Updated-Client-Performance-Issues-Multiple-Graphics-Cards-on-Windows) and let us know if it solves the problem?

Nah I managed to solve the issues, I think it was driver problems so I reinstalled everything and made sure I got the right drivers updated but I believe specifically it was my Nvidia game ready driver.
Cool! Have fun on the battlegrounds!!
